org.assertj.swing.fixture

Class JScrollPaneFixture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.fixture.AbstractComponentFixture<S,T,D>
      • org.assertj.swing.fixture.AbstractJComponentFixture<S,T,D>
        • org.assertj.swing.fixture.AbstractJPopupMenuInvokerFixture<JScrollPaneFixture,JScrollPane,JScrollPaneDriver>
          • org.assertj.swing.fixture.JScrollPaneFixture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JComponentFixture<JScrollPaneFixture>, JPopupMenuInvokerFixture, MouseInputSimulationFixture<JScrollPaneFixture>

    public class JScrollPaneFixture
extends AbstractJPopupMenuInvokerFixture<JScrollPaneFixture,JScrollPane,JScrollPaneDriver>
    Supports functional testing of JScrollPanes.
    Author:
    Yvonne Wang, Alex Ruiz

    • Constructor Detail

      • JScrollPaneFixture

        public JScrollPaneFixture(@Nonnull
                          Robot robot,
                          @Nonnull
                          JScrollPane target)
        Creates a new JScrollPaneFixture.
        Parameters:
        robot - performs simulation of user events on the given JScrollPane.
        target - the JScrollPane to be managed by this fixture.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if robot is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if target is null.

      • JScrollPaneFixture

        public JScrollPaneFixture(@Nonnull
                          Robot robot,
                          @Nullable
                          String panelName)
        Creates a new JScrollPaneFixture.
        Parameters:
        robot - performs simulation of user events on a JScrollPane.
        panelName - the name of the JScrollPane to find using the given Robot.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if robot is null.
        ComponentLookupException - if a matching JScrollPane could not be found.
        ComponentLookupException - if more than one matching JScrollPane is found.
